channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Early Black Friday bargain: This $199 3D printer from Bambu Lab offers four-color printing and near-silent operation
item.description: This early Black Friday deal drops the price of the Bambu Lab A1 mini 3D printer to just $199.

item.title: 7 Best Shower Water Filters (2025), WIRED Tested and Approved
item.description: We tested leading filtered showerheads, from Jolie to Canopy to Hydroviv. The winners were clear.

item.title: Moto électrique : Ultraviolette dévoile un trail, un maxi-scooter et un casque connecté et on les a vu
item.description: À l’EICMA 2025, Ultraviolette est sur tous les fronts avec son premier trail électrique, son maxi-scooter Tesseract, et un casque connecté. On était présent pour découvrir toutes ces nouveautés.

item.title: Voici sans doute le meilleur moyen d’avoir la PS5 Pro moins chère pendant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: La PlayStation 5 Pro est tout simplement la meilleure console de salon, toutes marques confondues. Vendue 799 euros neuve, Darty la propose à 679,99 euros en reconditionnée.

item.title: Nightly Smartphone Use at Bedtime Isn’t as Bad as You Think, Study Suggests
item.description: In a recent study, both occasional and regular bedtime screen users reported the best overall sleep health.

item.title: Amazon launches a low-price standalone shopping app, Amazon Bazaar, in over a dozen markets
item.description: On Friday, Amazon announced the debut of Amazon Bazaar, a new low-cost shopping destination for Asia, Africa, and Latin America that will be available separately from the main Amazon shopping app. On Bazaar, most products are available under $10, and some are as low as $2, the retailer says. The product selection, available now on Android and […]

item.title: GTA 6 won't be here for a year – here are 5 imminent and upcoming open-world games to play instead
item.description: You can forget about GTA 6 after it's been delayed again – but there are alternatives to consider over the next year.

item.title: CRKD is teasing a new drum kit controller to help recapture the glory of the Rock Band days
item.description: CRKD is set to expand its music game peripheral line-up with a drum kit controller.

item.title: The unbearable lightness of getting scammed: Future of full scale cybersecurity
item.description: Cybersecurity threats are shifting from malware to social engineering attacks, thus new ways of protection are needed. Byline covers the future of digital protection.

item.title: Fnac et Darty se montrent bien généreux lors du pré-Black Friday : les 17 deals qui valent le coup
item.description: Pour ne pas laisser le champ libre à Boulanger, la Fnac et Darty prennent aussi de l'avance sur le Black Friday et déploient à leur tour de solides offres sur de nombreux produits Tech. Nous avons fait le tri parmi toutes les offres, et voici uniquement celles qui valent le coup.

item.title: You don't need a gaming laptop to play Fortnite smoothly anymore – it can now run on super-thin-and-light Copilot+ laptops
item.description: Always wanted to play Fortnite on your Snapdragon X laptop? Your dream has come true – and the battle royale reportedly runs smoothly.

item.title: Galaxy S26 : il y a une petite chance que la France échappe à une puce Exynos
item.description: En dépit de mises à jour matérielles majeures, la nouvelle gamme Galaxy S26 pourrait toutefois bénéficier d'une puce Snapdragon, laissant entrevoir de meilleures performances pour l’Europe. Côté photo, le Galaxy S26 Ultra conserverait son matériel, mais gagnerait des améliorations logicielles importantes.

item.title: Cisco firewalls are facing another huge surge of attacks - here's what we know about these latest issues
item.description: Attackers are updating their techniques, Cisco is warning.

item.title: 4 ways to boost personal productivity in a distributed world
item.description: Tips on how to enhance personal productivity inside hybrid and asynchronous teams.

item.title: Meta lance la bouillie IA des vidéos Vibes en Europe
item.description: Meta exporte son « AI slop » en Europe. Le géant des réseaux sociaux a lancé son nouveau flux de vidéos générées par IA dans l'application Meta AI. Ce faisant, Meta fait mieux que son rival, Sora d'OpenAI !

item.title: How one founder plans to save cities from flooding with terraforming robots
item.description: Instead of building seawalls or dikes, Terranova has developed a new way to raise cities to protect them from sea level rise.

item.title: ‘Wicked: For Good’ Teases Its Two Major New Songs
item.description: Previews of the newly added songs for Glinda and Elphaba were revealed during the 'Wicked: One Wonderful Night' live show.

item.title: The Verge’s favorite holiday gifts under $100
item.description: Between all the new phones, smartwatches, and laptops we see throughout the year, it often feels like we're constantly being nudged toward shinier, more expensive gadgets. And I get it. As a self-professed gadget nerd, few things are more exciting than unboxing and setting up a new device. But the truth is, you can still […]

item.title: Lost in AI translation
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. Imagine you're minding your business on […]...

item.title: Big Tech tax breaks could’ve funded benefits for millions, Senator Warren finds
item.description: President Donald Trump’s “Big Beautiful Bill” is handing out billions in tax breaks, and a new analysis from Senator Elizabeth Warren’s (D-MA) office is demonstrating just how substantial those sums are. Under the law, Google’s parent company, Alphabet, will save around $17.9 billion in taxes this year, an amount that Warren’s office found could’ve paid […]...

item.title: Only 100 units of Secretlab's Lamborghini-inspired gaming chair have been made, and the brand is offering one last chance to get one for yourself
item.description: Secretlab is offering one last chance to snag its ultra rare Lamborghini gaming chair before it's gone for good.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Saturday, November 8 (game #615)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Saturday, November 8 (game #1384)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Saturday, November 8 (game #881)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to stream on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (November 7)
item.description: From the final Marvel movie of 2025 to Vince Gilligan's big-budget new TV show, here's what's worth watching this weekend.

item.title: Best Buy expands its Black Friday sale with dozens of new deals – I've picked the 17 top offers on headphones, laptops, TVs, and more
item.description: The Best Buy Black Friday sale to expanded with dozens of new deals, so we've taken a look through and picked out the best offers worth buying now.

item.title: Ce que cache le nouveau logo d’Apple TV : une prouesse visuelle sans image de synthèse
item.description: Présenté il y a quelques jours sur YouTube, Apple lève le voile sur un nouveau générique pour son service de streaming. Conçu « à la main », les équipes de production ont évité le recours aux images de synthèse.

item.title: Tesla rewards Elon Musk’s reality-distortion field
item.description: The most striking moment of Tesla's annual shareholder meeting Thursday wasn't when Elon Musk won a impossible sounding pay package worth nearly $1 trillion. That was a foregone conclusion, given Musk's popularity with retail shareholders and his ability to vote his own extensive holdings. To me, the more illuminating moment was when the gathered crowd […]...

item.title: J’ai quitté Gmail, 1Password, NordVPN et Google Drive pour Proton et vous devriez peut-être en faire autant
item.description: J'ai franchi le pas. Après 20 ans à confier mes emails et mes fichiers à Google, j'ai basculé sur Proton. Résultat ? Libération totale. Mais attention, ce n'est pas sans compromis.

item.title: This easy-to-miss Black Friday deal at Mint Mobile can save you 30% on your annual phone bill
item.description: Just need a cheap plan to cover the basics? Here's an incredibly cheap option over at Mint Mobile.

item.title: ProtonVPN crushes ads and trackers on Android TV app with latest update
item.description: The Proton VPN app for Android TV has integrated its NetShield feature, empowering users to neutralise ads and erase trackers. Here's all you need to know.

item.title: Ce puissant laptop avec écran OLED 120 Hz et Ultra 7 n’est qu’à 609 € grâce aux promotions du pré-Black Friday
item.description: L'Acer Aspire 16 est un PC portable léger, puissant et bien fluide avec son grand écran rafraîchi à 120 Hz. Un laptop idéal pour le travail en mobilité et la création, que l'on trouve, en ce pré-Black Friday, à 609 euros au lieu de 799 euros chez PC Componentes.

item.title: Meta reportedly makes 10% of its revenue from fraudulent ads and scams
item.description: Meta apparently makes huge profits from fraudulent ads - so is it in the company’s interest to crack down?

item.title: Arc Raiders patch notes: here's everything you need to know about the latest updates
item.description: Here's the latest Arc Raiders patch notes for 2025. Includes info on new maps, weapons, and skins.

item.title: Apple Watch Series 10 Is Selling for Peanuts, Now Cheaper Than Generic Android Watches
item.description: Stay fit, connected, and confident with the sleek new Apple Watch Series 10.

item.title: Spotify visé par une action en justice… pour les potentielles magouilles de Drake
item.description: Une nouvelle action en justice portée aux États-Unis à l'encontre de Spotify dénonce la prétendue passivité du géant de la musique en streaming dans une vaste affaire de fraude impliquant notamment le rappeur Drake.

item.title: 1,3 milliard de mots de passe, 2 milliards d’adresses mail : une gigantesque base de données piratées fait surface
item.description: Have I Been Pwned vient de gonfler sa base de données. Près de 2 milliards d’adresses e-mail et 1,3 milliard de mots de passe uniques ont été ajoutés au site web. Ces informations piratées proviennent de malwares voleurs de données et de compilations d’anciennes fuites, réinjectées dans de gigantesques répertoires très prisés des pirates.

item.title: Elon Musk’s $1 trillion pay package is approved by Tesla shareholders
item.description: The shareholder vote followed extensive debate over whether anyone deserved the record amount, including commentary from the pope. The world’s richest man was just handed a chance to become history’s first trillionaire.Elon Musk won a shareholder vote on Thursday that would give the Tesla CEO stock worth $1 trillion if he hits certain performance targets over the next decade. The vote followed weeks of debate over his management record at the electric car maker and whether anyone deserved such unprecedented pay, drawing heated commentary from small investors to giant pension funds and even t...

item.title: Texas AG sues Roblox, accusing it of prioritizing ‘pixel pedophiles’ over child safety
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton late on Thursday said he had sued online gaming platform Roblox, accusing the company of "deceiving parents about the dangers of its platform."

item.title: On est montés à bord de la Xpeng P7+ qui arrive en France : la moins chère des voitures électriques XXL
item.description: Après les G6 et G9, XPeng prépare activement le lancement d'une berline de grande taille : la P7+. Présente au salon de Lyon, nous avons pu monter à bord de cette berline aux dents longues.

item.title: Exclusive: Outdoor recreation on U.S. public lands generates $351 million a day in economic activity
item.description: Using federal public lands for fun and leisure provides sustainable long-term value that drilling and mining do not, a first-of-its-kind report reveals. The United States has about 640 million acres of public land, covering national parks to conservation areas and wild rivers to lake shores.

item.title: Moto just revealed super-cheap wireless earbuds with surprisingly beefy driver and Hi-Res Audio certification
item.description: Grime music fan? You might want to check out Moto Buds Bass

item.title: October Layoffs Were the Worst Since 2003 and Hit Tech Workers Hard
item.description: For coders, October royally sucked.

item.title: Bring back the iBook, you cowards
item.description: Apple is reportedly working on a low-cost laptop powered by an iPhone chip. This could be a small deal, a decision made by supply chain economics and the fact that the M1 MacBook Air continues to sell well at Walmart. Or it could be huge, a return to form for a company that once seemed […]

item.title: 13 Best Carry-On Luggage (2025): Away, Travelpro, and More
item.description: Whether you need a roller bag for a work trip or a tote for a bachelorette, we tested the best bags to bring on a plane.

item.title: US Congressional Budget Office hit by suspected cyberattack - here's what we know
item.description: Foreign adversaries may have accessed a congressional network.

item.title: Test de la JBL Boombox 4 : la meilleure des Boombox
item.description: Référence incontestée des grosses enceintes Bluetooth portables, la JBL Boombox semblait difficile à améliorer. Pourtant, JBL relève le défi avec une quatrième génération qui affine sa formule sans la dénaturer. Nous l'avons testée.

item.title: Watch the First Five Minutes of ‘Stranger Things’ Season 5 Right Now
item.description: Witness a de-aged Will run from a tree-climbing Demogorgon ahead of the final season of 'Stranger Things' this November on Netflix.

item.title: Hitman developers reveal how they chose the iconic locations in the series – 'it always starts with wouldn't it be cool if 47 went somewhere?'
item.description: We talk to the Hitman devs about how they choose new locations for Agent 47 to visit.

item.title: How Starbucks’s red cup became a holiday icon and a symbol of its workers’ discontent
item.description: As Starbucks rolls out promotion for its holiday menu, its union workers gear up to disrupt the company’s biggest day of the year. In a new holiday ad for Starbucks, set to the tune of I’m Gonna Be (500 Miles) by The Proclaimers, two adorable animated figures traipse across Starbucks’s red holiday cups to reunite. It’s a sweet video that highlights Starbucks’s transition into the winter holidays, one of the biggest sales moments of the year for the company....

item.title: Google Messages va améliorer l’intégration de YouTube
item.description: Google pourrait faire revenir une option disparue permettant à Google Message d'intégrer un mini lecteur de vidéo YouTube.

item.title: Avant-Black Friday smartphones à moins de 500 euros : les meilleures offres sur les Samsung Galaxy, Xiaomi Redmi et Nothing Phone
item.description: Si le Black Friday se fera attendre jusqu'à la fin du mois, les e-commerçants français n'ont eux pas attendu pour lancer des offres. Les smartphones font partie des produits qui profitent de réductions vraiment intéressantes, notamment sur l'entrée et le milieu de gamme.

item.title: Quelle est la console de jeu la plus vendue de l’Histoire ? Bataille pour le trône
item.description: La place de console de jeu vidéo la plus populaire de tous les temps est actuellement en jeu.

item.title: As the GOP prepares new bills without a healthcare fix, Democrats consider prolonging the shutdown
item.description: A test vote on a new bipartisan package could be imminent. Senate Republicans are moving to try to end the government shutdown by preparing a new bipartisan package of spending bills and daring Democrats to vote for it, but it was unclear if their plan would work.Many Democrats said they would continue to hold out for an extension of expiring health care subsidies, which was not expected to be part of the legislation.Senate Democrats, who have now voted 14 times not to reopen the government, left their second caucus meeting of the week Thursday with few answers about whether they eventually co...

item.title: Häagen-Dazs ice cream recalled nationwide: Be careful if you bought these chocolate mini bars from Kroger
item.description: The impacted sweet treats could cause serious or life-threatening reactions in consumers with wheat allergies. Here’s what to know. Ice cream maker Dreyer’s Grand Ice Cream Company has issued a voluntary recall of select Häagen-Dazs Chocolate Dark Chocolate Mini Bars after discovering they might have wheat in them.

item.title: The FBI Is Trying to Unmask the Registrar Behind Archive.Today
item.description: The popular archiving website is being targeted for investigation.

item.title: Ozempic Without the Nausea or Vomiting? This Drug Might Help
item.description: Preliminary research suggests that NG101, a drug from Neurogastrx, may lower the risk of nausea and vomiting in people taking semaglutide.
